pages.text:
Events
Beachfront Gatherings
Keep things
perfect
& stress-free.
Let’s start with a stunning waterfront view, white sandy beach, and one of the largest gulf-front decks on the west coast of Florida.
Weddings
Beach House has the perfect combination of award-winning culinary choices, and a multitude of beach, deck and decor options.
Our expert staff will help plan, coordinate and assist with every aspect of your big day at the perfect location…the Sunset Deck at the Beach House. Spectacular sunsets included!
Ready to learn more about planning your wedding or social event at the Beach House?
Gatherings
Do you want to thank your staff for their loyalty, host a product release party, or corporate training day? Perhaps you want to host a birthday party, anniversary, or celebration of life by the water. We can help you plan out your entire event. Tell us a little about your needs and our team will help you plan the perfect gathering!
Learn more
Gallery Reel

Bradenton Beach, FL  34217

– enter from the north driveway

– south lot and across the street

How can we help today?
*
Thank you!
Frequently Asked Questions
What is your pet policy?
Service Animals Only
We love furry friends, however, when you come and eat at the Sandbar or Beach House, pets should stay home! If you visit Mar Vista by boat, please keep them on your boat while you pick up your food.
We follow the Manatee County pet policy. Animals are not allowed in the restaurant unless providing a service to their owner. Please come join us soon for an unforgettable experience, but Buddy and FiFi are going to have to sit this one out. This is for all of our guest’s health and safety as well as your pets!
What are you accesibilty options?
Beach House can accommodate wheelchairs indoors or outdoors.
Do you take reservations?
We do not take reservations at the Beach House Waerfront Retaurant.
Where can I park?
There are two available parking options for you:
Complimentary Valet
– enter from the north driveway
Paid Self-Parking
– south lot and across the street

Privacy Policy

ABOUT
Seafood with a View
Set on pristine Gulf-front beach, the old Harbor House restaurant became Beach House in 1993.
Purchased in 1993 as a vision of a moderately priced restaurant serving great seafood both indoors and outdoors transformed into what is the Beach House Waterfront Restaurant. Today the location features a climate friendly outdoor deck providing beautiful oceanfront vistas and signature Anna Maria Island sunsets on display every evening.
Support the Local Environment
Throughout the process of the renovations which were completed in the Spring of 2017, the mantra of “be a good steward of the environment” echoed from the construction to the menu and beyond. The Beach House is a model for environmentally friendly development and operations.
